author: Night_City_Dream
title: Almost perfect as almost all Paradisa seta
review:
We got this set as early as in 1996 when Paradisa was one of the most advanced series to date.

This set is not very big but comes at a moderate price. It has 2 minifigs, one of which is a nice girl. On the main photo we can see two persons holding each other by hand, which makes me think the man is not a simple coachman ;)

The set is not very big, I repeat, but it comes with 3 (!) animals: the horse, a colt and a parrot. The carriage is simpls but nice. The coachman has quite a lot of accessories (saddle, whip). A small cafe under the leaves is a very good addition, too. What is also good about the set that it has a lot of plant stuff, being not very big.

And the colour scheme - it's typical of Paradisa but nice though.

So, I give this set 5. And I really regret Lego don't produce sets of this calibre any longer.
